sqlMap.statement:
SELECT A.ALERTKEY,A.APPLICATION_NUM,A.ALERT_MODE_CD,A.ALERT_TYPE_CD,A.RULEKEY,A.PBCKEY,A.ALERT_DT,A.ORGANKEY, A.OBJ_TYPE_CD,A.OBJKEY,A.OBJNAME,A.ALERT_STATUS_CD,A.AMOUNT,A.TRANS_NUM,A.STAFF_IND, A.STAFF_IN_IND,A.TXT,A.HANDLE_USR,A.CREATE_DT,A.RECORD_STATUS_CD FROM
T07_ALERT_DE A
T07_ALERT_KY A
T07_ALERT_DE_UH A
T07_ALERT_KY_UH A
WHERE 1>0
A.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
A.OBJKEY = #objkey#
A.ORGANKEY IN (SELECT SUBORGANKEY FROM T87_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY=#organnum#)
A.ORGANKEY IN ($organkey$)
A.OBJNAME LIKE #objname#
A.ALERT_STATUS_CD = #status#
A.ALERT_MODE_CD = #kind#
A.ALERT_TYPE_CD = #alert_type_cd#
A.PBCKEY = #pbckey#
A.APPLICATION_NUM = #application_num#
A.ALERT_DT >= #alert_dt_start:DATE#
A.ALERT_DT <= #alert_dt_end:DATE#
A.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
A.PBCKEY = #pbcrule#
ORDER BY A.ALERTKEY
ORDER BY A.ALERT_DT
ORDER BY A.ALERT_TYPE_CD
ORDER BY A.AMOUNT
ORDER BY A.ORGANKEY
DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM
T07_ALERT_DE A
T07_ALERT_KY A
T07_ALERT_DE_UH A
T07_ALERT_KY_UH A
WHERE 1>0
A.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
A.OBJKEY = #objkey#
A.ORGANKEY IN (SELECT SUBORGANKEY FROM T87_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY=#organnum#)
A.ORGANKEY IN ($organkey$)
A.OBJNAME LIKE #objname#
A.PBCKEY = #pbcrule#
A.ALERT_TYPE_CD = #alert_type_cd#
A.PBCKEY = #pbckey#
A.APPLICATION_NUM = #application_num#
A.ALERT_DT >= #alert_dt_start:DATE#
A.ALERT_DT <= #alert_dt_end:DATE#
A.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#

SELECT A.TX_GO_COUNTRY,A.TX_GO_AREA,A.HOST_CUST_ID,A.CASH_IND,A.CURR_CD,A.TX_OCCUR_COUNTRY ,A.TX_OCCUR_AREA,A.OPP_COUNTRY,A.OPP_AREA,A.OPP_ORGANNAME,A.AGENT_NAME,A.AGENT_COUNTRY,A.ORG_TRANS_RELA, A.AGENT_CARD_TYPE,A.AGENT_CARD_NO, A.TRANSACTIONKEY,A.CB_PK,A.TX_NO,A.ORGANKEY,A.TX_DT,A.DT_TIME,A.ACCT_NUM,A.PARTY_ID, A.PARTY_CLASS_CD,A.TX_CD,A.CB_TX_CD,A.BUS_TYPE_CD,A.TX_TYPE_CD,A.DEBIT_CREDIT,A.RECEIVE_PAY_CD, A.SUBJECTNO,A.CURRENCY_CD,A.AMT,A.CNY_AMT,A.USD_AMT,A.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,A.REMIT_TYPE_CD,A.DES, A.OVERAREA_IND,A.SETTLE_TYPE_CD,A.USE_DES,A.OPP_SYS_ID,A.OPP_AREA,A.OPP_ORGAN_TYPE,A.OPP_ORGANKEY,A.OPP_PBC_PARTY_CLASS_CD, A.OPP_PARTY_ID,A.OPP_NAME,A.OPP_ACCT_NUM,A.OPP_TX_DT,A.OPP_ACCT_TYPE_CD,A.OPP_CARD_TYPE,A.OPP_CARD_NO, A.OPP_PARTY_CLASS_CD,A.BATCH_IND,A.TELLER,A.RE_IND,A.HANDLE_STATUS_CD,A.PARTY_CHN_NAME,A.ADDTIONAL, A.VOUCHER_NO,A.HOST_CUST_ID,A.OPP_OFF_SHORE_IND,A.CAL_IND,A.VALIDATE_IND2,A.VALIDATE_IND,A.TSCTKEY, C.ALERTKEY,C.ALERT_DT,C.RULEKEY FROM
T07_ALERT_TRANS_DE B,T47_TRANSACTION_UC A ,T07_ALERT_DE C
T07_ALERT_TRANS_KY B , T47_TRANSACTION_UC A ,T07_ALERT_KY C
T07_ALERT_TRANS_DE_UH B ,V47_TRANSACTION A ,T07_ALERT_DE_UH C
T07_ALERT_TRANS_KY_UH B ,V47_TRANSACTION A ,T07_ALERT_KY_UH C
WHERE B.ALERTKEY=C.ALERTKEY AND B.TRANSACTIONKEY=A.TRANSACTIONKEY
C.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
C.OBJKEY = #objkey#
C.ORGANKEY IN (SELECT SUBORGANKEY FROM T87_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY=#organnum#)
C.ORGANKEY IN ($organkey$)
C.OBJNAME LIKE #objname#
C.PBCKEY = #pbcrule#
C.ALERT_TYPE_CD = #alert_type_cd#
C.PBCKEY = #pbckey#
C.APPLICATION_NUM = #application_num#
C.ALERT_DT >= #alert_dt_start:DATE#
C.ALERT_DT <= #alert_dt_end:DATE#
C.ALERT_DT >= #beginDate:DATE#
C.ALERT_DT <= #endDate:DATE#
C.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#

SELECT * FROM
T07_ALERT_DE A
T07_ALERT_KY A
T07_ALERT_DE_UH A
T07_ALERT_KY_UH A
WHERE A.ALERTKEY=#alertkey#

SELECT A.INDICNAME,A.UNIT,B.UPPER_LIMIT,B.LOW_LIMIT,B.INDIC_VAL,B.INDIC_SORCE FROM
V07_INDIC A, T07_ALERT_INDIC_DE B WHERE
V07_INDIC A, T07_ALERT_INDIC_KY B WHERE
V07_INDIC A, T07_ALERT_INDIC_DE_UH B WHERE
V07_INDIC A, T07_ALERT_INDIC_KY_UH B WHERE
V07_INDIC A, T07_ALERT_INDIC_KY B WHERE
A.INDICKEY = B.INDICKEY
B.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#

SELECT B.ALERTKEY,B.STATUS_CD,A.TRANSACTIONKEY,A.TX_NO,A.PARTY_ID,A.PARTY_CHN_NAME,A.TX_DT,A.ORGANKEY,A.ACCT_NUM,A.OPP_NAME,A.CURRENCY_CD,A.AMT,A.USE_DES,A.DEBIT_CREDIT,A.TX_TYPE_CD,A.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,A.VALIDATE_IND,A.VALIDATE_IND2 FROM
T47_TRANSACTION_UC A, T07_ALERT_TRANS_DE B, T07_ALERT_DE C WHERE
T47_TRANSACTION_UC A, T07_ALERT_TRANS_KY B, T07_ALERT_KY C WHERE
V47_TRANSACTION A, T07_ALERT_TRANS_DE_UH B, T07_ALERT_DE_UH C WHERE
V47_TRANSACTION A, T07_ALERT_TRANS_KY_UH B, T07_ALERT_KY_UH C WHERE
T47_TRANSACTION_UC A, T07_ALERT_TRANS_KY B, T07_ALERT_KY C WHERE
C.ALERTKEY = B.ALERTKEY AND B.TRANSACTIONKEY = A.TRANSACTIONKEY
C.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
ORDER BY A.TX_DT

SELECT COUNT(A.TRANSACTIONKEY) FROM
T47_TRANSACTION_UC A, T07_ALERT_TRANS_DE B, T07_ALERT_DE C WHERE
T47_TRANSACTION_UC A, T07_ALERT_TRANS_KY B, T07_ALERT_KY C WHERE
V47_TRANSACTION A, T07_ALERT_TRANS_DE_UH B, T07_ALERT_DE_UH C WHERE
V47_TRANSACTION A, T07_ALERT_TRANS_KY_UH B, T07_ALERT_KY_UH C WHERE
T47_TRANSACTION_UC A, T07_ALERT_TRANS B, T07_ALERT C WHERE
C.ALERTKEY = B.ALERTKEY AND B.TRANSACTIONKEY = A.TRANSACTIONKEY
C.ALERTKEY = #alertkey#
